answers.answer: Oh dont worry really...i gaoned 80 pounds this pregnancy and im 34 weeks now ..i dont have diabetea nothing...the doctors couldnt beleive i didnt get diabetes they tested me like 3 times by the glucose test and couldnt beleive it how come im healthy and have no issues...so it is individually...its not a must for diabetes..goodd luck
I wouldn't get worried until you have heard the final results yourself.
I'm walking the line as well and have made some small changes to my diet removing bread,pasta & rice. It seems to help I went from gaining zero weight for 6 months to 7 lbs in 4 weeks :(

I wouldn't worry too much. .... Just try to eat healthy and exercise as much as you can. I've gained a lot of weight this pregnancy add well and my glucose came back normal. Sometimes some doctors have the tendency to over worry their patients.

question: I went to the doctor a couple days ago and he's worried about me getting diabetes because I have gained 11 lbs in 6 weeks. I don't eat a whole lot and gained so much weight. I don't know really what to do.
title: scared!!!
